title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 363.13 - Limitation of obligation of state aid to soil and water conservation districts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 363.13 - Limitation of obligation of state aid to soil and water conservation districts

State Regulations

Funding pursuant to this Part shall be provided only to the
extent that there is an appropriation made by the New York State Legislature to
the department and the committee for this purpose. Notes

ยง
363.13

Amended and

Renumbered from 363.12

New

York State Register February 5, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 05, eff. 2/5/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
